name: Leap of Champions
description:
• Title: Leap of Champions
  • Game Mode: Competitive and cooperative multiplayer online
  • Genre: First person shooter
  • Players: From 1 to 32 per Game (max 8 bots available per team)
  • Technology: Unreal engine 4
  • Platform: Pc
  • Mods: deathmatch – team deathmatch - dominion
  • Setting: Sci-Fi universe
  • Target: players 13+
  • Expected rating: teen [ESRB]
  • Language: English


Backstory

"Time is a river without levees and bights that instead of flowing towards the sea, it returns to its spring."

These are the words engraved in the boardroom of the Order of Klepsydria, the legendary eternal city out of time and space. It is said that here is where the Champions live and where only them can return.
The Order of Klepsydria, or Order of Champions, is as old as time itself. There has always been a guard at protection of the flow of time, but only few in the whole universe know about its existence. Becoming a Champion is the greatest honor and the destiny of a selected few allowed from the highest members of the Order itself.

The Power of Champions:
All Champions have incredible skills: they have access to advanced technology as well as arcane ancient knowledge, both at the same time advanced and unattainable for anyone in the universe.
Since they cannot be killed, Champions have forgotten the fear for death
Finally, Champions have the ultimate power: the Leap. Thanks to the this incredible skill, all Champions can reach any place, in time and space and doing so, they are even able to escape death.

The Final Goal of the First Order:
All this power is put at service of the protection of the Flow of Time, due to that, Champions are fighting a war since the very beginning of time. An eternal war which is also as old as time.
When the First Order of the Champions was born, it has been decided to protect the flowing of time without any interference or deviation, without affecting its course in any possible way.

The origin of the Eternal Conflict
Unfortunately, part of that First Order disagreed with the means of the mission.
Some elder members of the First Order of Champions considered time as a flow that could be diverted and sometimes even stopped. Therefore, the Council split in 2 opposite factions: on one side there was the Alphas, committed to the first principle, so observing and protecting with no interference; on the other side, the Omegas, intentioned to stem and divert the flowing of events depending on what the Order thought it was best for the greater good of the Universe.
The tension between the two factions keep rising until it reaches a point of no return and the Omega faction decided to initiate a war to annihilate the Alpha and challenge the Flow of Time itself. Their intention was to manipulate the very course of the “River of Time”.
But manipulating that flow could bring to consequences that could be understood clearly by only those who will prevail in the Eternal Conflict.


Mods

Deathmatch:
Take a Leap to reach the battlefield and defeat all the opposing Champions. The first one to reach 20 kills wins.

  • Victory parameters: The first Champion to reach 20 kills
  • Map: Forest
  • Max of player: From 1 to 32
  • Bots available: Max 8
  • Random Respawn time: 3 seconds
  • Classes: Scout, assault, medic, support (you can change classes when you die, if you want to change classes while alive, you will lose a kill)
  • Primary weapons: Assault rifle, sniper rifle, machinegun
  • Secondary weapon: Shotgun
  • Grenade: Grenade, smoke bomb, sticky bomb (max 2)
  • Bonus: Speed boost, +ammo, +grenade, health boost

Team Deathmatch:
Take part of the neverending conflict between the Alphas and the Omegas. Detonate the Flow Core in the opposing base or defeat more Champions than the opposing team to win

  • Victory parameters: The first team to reach 100 kills or detonate Flow Core in the opposing base
  • Map: Forest
  • Max of player: From 1 to 32 (16 per team)
  • Bots available: Max 8 per team
  • In base respawn time: 3 second
  • Classes: Scout, assault, medic, support (you can change classes when you die, if you want to change classes while alive, you will lose a kill)
  • Primary weapons: Assault rifle, sniper rifle, machinegun
  • Secondary weapon: Shotgun
  • Grenade: Grenade, smoke bomb, sticky bomb (max 2)
  • Bonus: Speed boost, +ammo, +grenade, health boost

Dominion:
Every Core is essential for the control of the Flow of Time. Conquer and defend the Flow Cores to acquire their power and defeat the opposing team.

  • Victory parameters: Conquer the domain zones to get points. The first team to reach 600 point wins
  • Conquer Mechanic: Stay for 10 seconds within the correct area of a neutral domain zone to conquer it. Stay for 10 seconds within an area controlled by the opponent team to make it neutral and stay for other 10 seconds in the area to conquer it.
  • Map: Industrial
  • Max of player: From 1 to 32 (16 per team)
  • Bots available: Max 8 per team
  • Random respawn time: 3 second
  • Classes: Scout, assault, medic, support (you can change classes when you die, if you want to change classes while alive, you will lose a kill)
  • Primary weapons: Assault rifle, sniper rifle, machinegun
  • Secondary weapon: Shotgun
  • Grenade: Grenade, smoke bomb, sticky bomb (max 2)
  • Bonus: Speed boost, +ammo, +grenade, health boost


The game is currently in development. We will add new contents for each patch as well as new information on content release plan!


We are a little software house, but we are working hard to develop a game for you, the players, and this already make us very proud and happy. We believe in this project and only with your help and your hints we can realise an amazing project.
The game will be realised first in early access. This can give us the time to fix bugs and create new content.
Hoping that this thrills you, we are also thinking about working on a single player adventure.
Finally, we would love to hear from you, so please get in touch with us on social media, or with an email at leaf.games.software@gmail.com.
